name: 0 - Outro
_source: speak;Caroline; Now, what were you two thinking by going off all by yourselves?!{w} You worried me sick!
speak;Emma; I said we're fine, mom!{w} Emily wanted to take me for a surprise, that's it.{w} But, we saw that eyeball thing attach itself to a corpse{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; I saw a lot more of them on my way.{w} We need to head back home right now!{w} Marica and Sonia are handling them with Lily,{w} but we can't leave the village's safety up to chance.
speak;Emily; Guys, look!{w} There's smoke coming from the village!{w} The demons are wrecking the place!
speak;Emma; What!?! No, we have to stop them now!{w} We need to save Lily and help the rest!
speak;Emily; The usual road back down will take us too long.{w} Follow me, I know a shortcut through the woods to get back.
